price: Sila akka Rabbiin samii irraa bishaan buusee, dachiin (isaan) magariisa taate hin arginee? Rabbiin rahmata godhaa, keessa beekaadha.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَتُصۡبِحُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُخۡضَرَّةًۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samāi māan fatuṣ'biḥu al-arḍu mukh'ḍarratan inna al-laha laṭīfun khabīrun
